name: copilotprompts-daily-chore-children
title: The Hero's Chore Journey - An AI-powered gamification of daily chores for chidren
shortDescription: An AI-powered gamification of daily chores for chidren
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use Microsoft Copilot to gamify daily chores for children. It provides a structured approach to encourage children to complete their chores by turning them into a fun and engaging game.
